## utils.toolbox.BlockInfo interface

The information needed to create a block in the toolbox. Note that disabled has a different type for backwards compatibility.  Blockly.utils.toolbox.BlockInfo

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BlockInfo 
```
